title: List of HNK Hajduk Split presidents
text:
<a href="HNK%20Hajduk%20Split">Hrvatski nogometni klub Hajduk Split</a> is a professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Split%2C%20Croatia">Split</a>, <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>, which plays in the <a href="Prva%20HNL">Prva HNL</a>. This chronological list comprises all those who have held the position of president of Hajduk Split from 1911, when the first president was appointed, to the present day.
The first president of Hajduk Split was Kruno Kolombatović, who was in charge from 1911 to 1912. Longest serving president in Hajduk's history was Tito Kirigin who spent ten years at the position. He was also the most successful president, with Hajduk winning nine trophies during his tenure: four <a href="Yugoslav%20First%20League">Yugoslav First League</a> championships and five <a href="Yugoslav%20Cup">Yugoslav Cup</a> titles. The current president is <a href="Marin%20Brbi%C4%87">Marin Brbić</a>, who was appointed on 6 March 2019.
Hajduk had numerous presidents over the course of their history, some of which have been honorary presidents, here is a complete list of them:
Presidents of the Hajduk Sports Association.
"Active from 1948 to 1949"
Presidents of the Hajduk Conference.
"Active from 1984 to 1988"
